Case 1:19-cr-00490-RMB Document 7 Filed 07/11/19 Page 2 of 3

WHEREFORE, Mr. Epstein respectfully requests that this Honorable Court allow him leave to file his supplemental financial disclosure under seal.

Respectfully Submitted,
Jeffrey Epstein
By His Attorneys,

/s/ Reid Weingarten
Reid Weingarten
Steptoe & Johnson, LLP (NYC)
1114 Avenue of the Americas
New York, NY 10036

/s/ Marc Allan Fernich

810 Seventh Ave., Suite 620
New York, NY 10019
(212) 446-2346
maf@fernichlaw.com

Dated: July 11, 2019

2

DOJ-OGR-00000321

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court filing related to Jeffrey Epstein's case. It is a formal request to file a supplemental financial disclosure under seal. The document is signed by three attorneys: Reid Weingarten, Martin G. Weinberg, and Marc Allan Fernich.
